title: If You Don't Know, Now You Know - History of the Filibuster | Cynthia Erivo
itunes:title: If You Don't Know, Now You Know - History of the Filibuster | Cynthia Erivo
description:
Trevor explores the history of the Senate filibuster, a mass shooter in the Atlanta area kills several Asian women, and actor and singer Cynthia Erivo discusses her role in "Genius: Aretha."


In honor of Women's History Month, help level the playing field for girls of color in STEM by donating at dailyshow.com/BlackGirlsCode.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
